title: Adjusting the size
text: This video instruction describes how to properly adjust the size of your BiLumix to fit your head.

title: Power On-Off
text:
This video instruction describes how to turn on/off the light on your BiLumix and details some common problems and troubleshooting tips with regards to the LED lights.
Do not remove the battery while in use. Make sure to turn off the headlamp via the on/off switch on back before removing the battery.
* To turn on the light, hold down the power button for 1 second
